package.name: apache2-mod_php5
package.description: - the CURL module lacked checks for control characters (CVE-2006-2563)) - str_repeat() contained an integer overflow - ext/wddx contained a buffer overflow - memory_limit() lacked checks for integer overflows - a bug in sscanf() could potentially be exploited to execute arbitrary code (CVE-2006-4020) - an uninitialized varable caused apache to crash during startup - corrupt gif images could crash php
